ValidationRule.description: Restrict field to numeric values if Decision Code = DNB Custom || Experian Consumer || Equifax Consumer
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Id !='00570000001tweu',OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Credit_Bureau_Source__c, "DNB Custom" ), ISPICKVAL( Credit_Bureau_Source__c, "Experian Consumer" ), ISPICKVAL( Credit_Bureau_Source__c, "Equifax Consumer" ) ), LEN ( Credit_Bureau_Score__c ) > 0, NOT(ISNUMBER( Credit_Bureau_Score__c )) ), AND ( ISPICKVAL( Credit_Bureau_Source__c, "Moodys" ), LEN ( Credit_Bureau_Score__c ) > 0, ISNUMBER( Credit_Bureau_Score__c ) ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Please Check Below Criteria:
1/ When Decision Code is DNB Custom, Experian Consumer, or Equifax Consumer - Credit Bureau Score must be numeric values.
2/ When Decision Code is Moodys - Credit Bureau Score must be alphanumeric values.
